code: d3.json("../data/flare.json").then(data=>{console.log("Radial Data:",data);const width=1000;const height=500;const radius=Math.min(width,height)/2;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.value);d3.partition().size([2*Math.PI,radius])(root);console.log("Radial Root:",root);const svg=d3.select("#radial svg").attr("viewBox",[-width/2,-height/2,width,height]);const arc=d3.arc().startAngle(d=>d.x0).endAngle(d=>d.x1).innerRadius(d=>d.y0).outerRadius(d=>d.y1);const color=d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.quantize(d3.interpolateRainbow,root.children.length+1));svg.selectAll("path").data(root.descendants()).enter().append("path").attr("d",arc).attr("fill",d=>color(d.depth)).append("title").text(d=>"".concat(d.ancestors().map(d=>d.data.name).reverse().join("/"),"\n").concat(d.value));}).catch(error=>console.error("Error loading Radial Data:",error));
